attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
ID cards take away our freedom
they allow police to stop us in the street encouraging rascim
they do not really stop crime
they have only been used during war or in countries with limited or no rights
then why are our rights being infringed on, our money being spent, all in the guise to stop terroism and crime
'power tends to corrupt and absolute power corrupts absolutly' lets not give the government any more power over us
say no to id

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
